abstract: Thirty-five titles by the author of “2001: A Space Odyssey” are now available for $8.99 each.
snippet: Thirty-five titles by the author of “2001: A Space Odyssey” are now available for $8.99 each.
lead_paragraph: Thirty-five titles by the celebrated science fiction writer Arthur C. Clarke, the author of “2001: A Space Odyssey,” among other classics, will be released in digital form for the first time in the United States, the independent e-book publisher RosettaBooks said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Arthur C. Clarke E-Books for Sale in U.S.
